item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (559 points | 166 comments)
2. 5000x Faster CRDTs (75 points | 7 comments)
3. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (147 points | 28 comments)
4. Sainsbury Wing contractors find 1990 letter from donor (218 points | 53 comments)
5. The Monospace Web (118 points | 21 comments)
6. Blitzortung – real time lightning strikes around the world (113 points | 30 comments)
7. DisTrO – a family of low latency distributed optimizers (44 points | 15 comments)
8. EasyPost (YC S13) Is Hiring ( | hide)
9. Taskwarrior – CLI Task Management (29 points | 4 comments)
10. KLEE Symbolic Execution Engine (25 points | 5 comments)
11. The Simple Algorithm That Ants Use to Build Bridges (2018) (31 points | 3 comments)
12. Vulnerabilities show why STARTTLS should be avoided if possible (2021) (50 points | 14 comments)
13. How Chrome Accessibility Works (17 points | 8 comments)
14. Rustproofing Linux (Part 1/4 Leaking Addresses) (2023) (39 points | 4 comments)
15. Launch HN: Bucket Robotics (YC S24) – Defect detection for molded and cast parts (68 points | 17 comments)
16. Should the richest 1% – who gained $42T/decade – be taxed more? (23 points | 19 comments)
17. U.S. Ambassador says Canadians are consuming 'unhealthy' amount of American news (146 points | 165 comments)
18. Anthropic publishes the 'system prompts' that make Claude tick (301 points | 191 comments)
19. Malware infiltrates Pidgin messenger's official plugin repository (101 points | 10 comments)
20. Splatt3R: Zero-Shot Gaussian Splatting from Uncalibrated Image Pairs (103 points | 23 comments)
21. Tattoo ink sold on Amazon has high levels of weird and rare bacteria (9 points | 3 comments)
22. A New Wave of Underwater Comms Is Coming (33 points | 12 comments)
23. PyRoboCOP: Python-Based Robotic Control and Optimization Package (10 points | discuss)
24. Zuckerberg claims regret on caving to White House pressure on content (391 points | 756 comments)
25. Starliner Is Such a Disaster That Boeing May Cancel the Entire Project (66 points | 68 comments)
26. Ruby in Jupyter Notebook (160 points | 52 comments)
27. Hackers infect ISPs with malware that steals customers' credentials (10 points | 3 comments)
28. New 0-Day Attacks Linked to China's 'Volt Typhoon' (169 points | 37 comments)
29. Microsoft security tools questioned for treating employees as threats (21 points | discuss)
30. Why is the Oral-B iOS app almost 300 MB? And why is Colgate's app even bigger..? (180 points | 161 comments)
